products.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the Amor Salmon Pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok! Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from. products.title: Amor Soft Peach Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor Soft Peach Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: Our range of blackout fabrics are perfect for blocking the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy whenever you need it. Especially when you order the Amor Soft Peach, a perfectly peachy colour to cover your window. Being blackout, no light will be able to pass through the fabric making it perfect for living rooms and bedrooms. products.title: Voile FR Moondust Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Voile FR Moondust Grey 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £12.11 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile FR Moondust Grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in ths modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame Retardant and Pollergen-coated, makes this sheer vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space. 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, our customers and quality comes first, that's why we offer a five-year guarantee on our made-to-measure blinds. Based in West Yorkshire, our vertical blinds are carefully cut and assembled by our expert vertical blind team.

products.productdescription: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Amor Electric Lime Vertical Blind

products.productdescription: The green colour of the Amor Electric Lime is best suited to rooms with neutral tones so as to make the most of this colour. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.productdescription: The pale, lilac Mist colour is best used in a room where you want the blind to blend in with the rest of the room. Use this with similar pastel tones. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, Fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean.. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.
